Direksi merupakan  organ  Bank  yang  berwenang  dan bertanggung jawab penuh atas pengelolaan Bank untuk kepentingan  Bank  sesuai  dengan  maksud  dan  tujuan Bank serta mewakili Bank, baik di dalam maupun di luar pengadilan,  sesuai  dengan  ketentuan  Anggaran  Dasar dan peraturan perundang-undangan yang berlaku. Direksi memiliki  tanggung  jawab  penuh  secara  kolegial  atas pengelolaan  Bank  sesuai  dengan  ketentuan  Anggaran Dasar Bank. Namun demikian, pelaksanaan tugas di antara anggota  Direksi dilakukan sesuai dengan  pembagian tugas dan kewenangannya masing-masing dengan tujuan mencapai  efektivitas  pengelolaan  dan  pencapaian  hasil yang maksimal.

## Pedoman Kerja Direksi

Direksi Bank memiliki Pedoman dan Tata Tertib Kerja Direksi yang  disusun  berdasarkan  Anggaran  Dasar  Bank  serta ketentuan dan perundang-undangan yang berlaku. Sesuai dengan POJK No. 17 Tahun 2023 tentang Penerapan Tata Kelola bagi Bank Umum, Pedoman dan Tata Tertib Kerja Dewan Komisaris mengatur hal-hal sebagai berikut:

- 1. Pendahuluan;
- 2. Penjelasan Umum;
- 3. Keanggotaan dan Etika Direksi;
- 4. Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab Direksi;
- 5. Waktu Kerja dan Rapat Direksi;
- 6. Rapat Koordinasi Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris;
- 7. Benturan Kepentingan; serta
- 8. Penutup.

Selain itu, anggota  Direksi juga berkewajiban untuk menyampaikan informasi kepada Bank mengenai kepemilikan dan setiap perubahan kepemilikan atas saham Bank.

## Jumlah, Komposisi, dan Independensi Direksi

## Jumlah

Anggota  Direksi  Bank  berjumlah  5  (lima)  orang.  Jumlah tersebut melebihi dari ketentuan POJK No. 17 tahun 2023 tentang Penerapan Tata Kelola Bagi Bank Umum, di mana Bank wajib mempunyai Direksi minimal 3 (tiga) orang.

134

PT Bank IBK Indonesia Tbk Laporan Tahunan dan Laporan Keberlanjutan

The  Board  of  Directors  is  an  organ  of  the  Bank  that  is authorized  and  full  responsible  for  managing  the  Bank for  the  Bank's  interests,  in  line  with  the  Bank's  purposes and objectives and representing the Bank, both inside and outside the court, in accordance with the provisions of the Articles of Association and applicable laws and regulations. The Board of Directors has full collegial responsibility for managing  the  Bank  in  accordance  with  the  provisions of the Bank's Articles of Association. However, the implementation of duties among members of the Board of Directors is carried out in accordance with the division of duties and authority of each with the aim of achieving effective management and achieving utmost results.

## Board of Directors Charter

The  Board  of  Directors  of  the  Bank  has  a  Board  of Directors Charter, prepared based on the Bank's Articles of Association and applicable laws and regulations. Pursuant to POJK No. 17 of 2023 on Governance Implementation for Commercial  Banks, the Board of Commissioners Charter regulates the following matters:

- 1. Introduction;
- 2. General Explanation;
- 3. Membership and Ethics of Board of Directors;
- 4. Duties and Responsibilities of Board of Directors;
- 5. Working Hours and Meetings of Board of Directors;
- 6. Coordination  Meeting  of  the  Board  of  Directors  and Board of Commissioners;
- 7. Conflicts of Interest; and
- 8. Closing.

In  addition,  members  of  the  Board  of  Directors  are  also required  to  submit  information  to  the  Bank  regarding ownership and any changes of ownership of the Bank's shares.

## Number, Composition, and Independence of Board of Directors

## Number

The  Board  of  Directors  of  the  Bank  consists  of  5  (five) members.  This  number  exceeds  the  provisions  of  POJK No.  17  of  2023  on  Implementation  of  Governance  for Commercial Banks, in which the Bank is required to have at least 3 (three) Directors.

## Komposisi

Pengangkatan Direksi menjadi wewenang RUPS. Seluruh anggota  Direksi  Bank  telah  memenuhi  kriteria  sebagai Direksi, sesuai dengan  ketentuan  yang  berlaku  pada Anggaran  Dasar  Bank,  Pedoman  dan  Tata  Tertib  Kerja Direksi,  ketentuan  perundang-undangan  yang  berlaku, serta  telah  melalui  uji  kemampuan  dan  kepatutan  ( fit and  proper  test )  dari  Bank  Indonesia  atau  Otoritas  Jasa Keuangan. Pada tahun 2023, susunan Direksi Bank mengalami perubahan seiring dengan pengangkatan Bapak  Edwin  Rudianto  sebagai  Direktur Bank  sesuai dengan  keputusan  RUPSLB  tanggal  8  Februari  2023. ## Independensi

Bank  menjamin  independensi  seluruh  anggota  Direksi dalam menjalankan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya. Direksi juga  senantiasa  bersikap  profesional  untuk  memberikan kontribusi bagi kemajuan Bank.

## Keberagaman Komposisi Direksi

Penentuan  komposisi  Direksi  Bank  dilaksanakan  dengan memperhatikan keberagaman keahlian, pengetahuan, pengalaman,  usia,  dan  jenis  kelamin  yang  dibutuhkan Bank  dalam  mendukung  kegiatan  usaha  dalam  industri perbankan  maupun  status  Bank  sebagai  perusahaan  terbuka sesuai  dengan  Lampiran  SEOJK  No.  32/SEOJK.04/2015 tentang Pedoman Tata Kelola Perusahaan Terbuka. Bank menerapkan nilai keberagaman dalam keanggotaan Direksi  dengan  tujuan  agar  tercipta  keberagaman  solusi dan perspektif  dalam  memecahkan  setiap  masalah  yang dihadapi  Bank.  Nilai  keberagaman  dalam  keanggotaan manajerial Bank juga dapat mempermudah pengambilan keputusan secara tepat pada segala kondisi yang dihadapi Bank. Selain itu, keberagaman jenis kelamin juga menunjukkan bahwa Bank memiliki komitmen dalam hal kesetaraan gender sampai di tingkat Direksi.

## Independency

The  Bank  guarantees  the  independence  of  all  members of  Board  of  Directors  in  performing  their  duties  and responsibilities. The Board of Directors constantly behaves professionally to contribute to the Bank's progress.

## Diversity in the Board of Directors' Composition

The  Board  of  Directors'  composition  is  determined  by considering the diversity of skills, knowledge, experience, age, and gender required by the Bank in order to support business activities in banking industry and the Bank's status as a public company in accordance with SEOJK Appendix No.  32/SEOJK.04/2015  on  Public  Company  Governance Guidelines. The Bank applies diversity value in the Board of Directors' composition with the aim of creating a diversity of solutions and perspectives in solving every problem faced by the Bank. The diversity value in the Bank's managerial composition can also facilitate in making the right decisions in  all  conditions  faced  by  the  Bank.  In  addition,  gender diversity also shows that the Bank is committed to gender equality up to the Board of Directors level.

## Penilaian Kinerja Komite dan Satuan Kerja di Bawah Direksi

Direksi secara periodik melakukan penilaian kinerja terhadap  Komite-Komite  dan  Satuan  Kerja  yang  berada di bawah Direksi. Penilaian kinerja ini merupakan bagian dari  upaya  Bank  untuk  mengevaluasi  dan  meningkatkan kinerja  masing-masing  Komite  dan  Satuan  Kerja  untuk periode berikutnya.

## Performance Assessment of Committees and Work Units under the Board of Directors

The Board of Directors periodically conducts performance assessments of the Committees and Work Units under the Board of Directors. The performance assessment is part of the Bank's efforts to evaluate and improve the performance of each Committee and Work Unit for the next period.

## Prosedur dan Kriteria Penilaian Kinerja Komite di Bawah Direksi

Prosedur penilaian kinerja Komite di bawah Direksi dilakukan berdasarkan pencapaian fungsi dan tugas masing-masing serta efektivitas dan efisiensinya. Penilaian kinerja  untuk  Komite Asset  Liability ,  Komite  Manajemen Risiko, Komite Pengarah Teknologi Informasi, dan Komite Kredit  dilakukan  dengan  menggunakan  kriteria  sebagai berikut:

- 1. Pelaksanaan rapat;
- 2. Tingkat kehadiran anggota Komite dan Satuan Kerja Direksi;
- 3. Pelaksanaan  penyampaian  laporan  kerja  Komite  dan Satuan Kerja Direksi; serta
- 4. Dokumentasi laporan kerja Komite dan Satuan Kerja Direksi.

Kriteria penilaian tersebut kemudian akan dilakukan scoring dengan ketentuan sebagai berikut:

- 1. Masing-masing kriteria memiliki score dari 1 - 5;
- 2. Pilih score untuk masing-masing kriteria sesuai dengan kondisi Bank; serta
- 3. Score akhir  merupakan  rata-rata  dari  kriteria  yang dilakukan penilaian.

Berdasarkan prosedur dan kriteria yang telah ditetapkan, hasil  penilaian  kinerja  Komite  Direksi  untuk  tahun  buku 2023 diuraikan sebagai berikut:

## Procedures and Criteria for Performance Assessment of Committees Under the Board of Directors

Performance assessment procedures for Committees under  the  Board  of  Directors  are  carried  out  based  on the achievement of their respective functions and duties as well as their effectiveness and efficiency. Performance assessment for the Asset Liability Committee, Risk Management Committee, Information Technology Steering Committee, and Credit Committee are carried out using the following criteria:

- 1. Implementation of meetings;
- 2. Attendance rate of members of Committees and Work Units of the Board of Directors;
- 3. Submission of work reports of Committees and Work Units of the Board of Directors; and
- 4. Documentation  of  work  reports  of  Committees  and Work Units of the Board of Directors.

The  assessment  criteria  will  then  be  scored  under  the following conditions:

- 1. Each criterion is assigned with a score from 1 - 5;
- 2. Assign a score to each criterion in accordance with the Bank's conditions; and
- 3. The final  score  is  calculated  by  averaging  the  criteria evaluated.

Based  on  the  established  procedures  and  criteria,  the performance assessment results of the Board of Directors' Committees  for  the  2023  fiscal  year  are  described  as follows:

## Prosedur dan Penilaian Kinerja Sekretaris Perusahaan

Prosedur  dan  penilaian  kinerja  yang  dilakukan  untuk Sekretaris Perusahaan dilakukan oleh Direksi berdasarkan pencapaian kinerja Sekretaris Perusahaan sepanjang 2023. Direksi berpandangan Sekretaris Perusahaan telah dengan baik  membantu  memfasilitasi  komunikasi  baik  internal maupun eksternal Bank.

## Prosedur dan Penilaian Kinerja SKAI

Prosedur  dan  penilaian  kinerja  yang  dilakukan  untuk SKAI dilakukan oleh Direksi berdasarkan dukungan audit  internal  terhadap  tugas  Direksi  terkait  kegiatan assurance terhadap  unit  bisnis  Bank.  Pada  tahun  2023, SKAI  telah  melaksanakan  kegiatan assurance sebanyak 20  kali  pemeriksaan  terdiri  dari  kantor  cabang,  kantor pusat,  teknologi  informasi,  dan  kegiatan  spesial  audit. Berdasarkan  pelaksanaan  tugas  SKAI  di  tahun  2023, Direksi  berpandangan  bahwa  SKAI  sudah  melaksanakan fungsi  dan  tugasnya  untuk  membantu  kinerja  Direksi dengan baik.

## Procedures and Performance Assessment of Corporate Secretary

The procedures and performance assessment for the Corporate Secretary are carried out by the Board of Directors based on the performance achievements of the Corporate Secretary throughout 2023. The Board of Directors believes that  the  Corporate  Secretary  has  properly  facilitated  the communication, both internal and external to the Bank.

## Procedures and Performance Assessment of SKAI (Internal Audit Unit)

The  procedures  and  performance  assessment  for  SKAI  are carried out by the Board of Directors based on internal audit support on the Board of Directors' duties related to assurance activities on the Bank' s business units. In 2023, SKAI carried out 20 audits on assurance activities on the Bank's business units, consisting of branch offices, head offices, information technology, and special audit activities. Based on the implementation of SKAI's duty in 2023, the Board of Directors believed that SKAI properly carried out its functions and duties to assist the Board of Directors' performance.

Dewan Komisaris merupakan organ tata kelola Bank yang memiliki  tugas  dan  tanggung  jawab  untuk  melakukan pengawasan secara umum dan/atau khusus sesuai dengan Anggaran Dasar serta memberikan nasihat kepada Direksi terkait  pelaksanaan  tugas  dan  tanggung  jawab  Direksi. Dewan  Komisaris  juga  berperan  aktif  dalam  memantau efektivitas  penerapan  tata  kelola  dalam  kegiatan  usaha Bank pada seluruh tingkatan atau jenjang organisasi Bank.

## Pedoman Kerja Dewan Komisaris

Dewan  Komisaris Bank memiliki Pedoman  dan  Tata Tertib  Kerja  Dewan  Komisaris  yang  disusun  berdasarkan Anggaran  Dasar  Bank  serta  ketentuan  dan  perundangundangan yang berlaku. Sesuai dengan POJK No. 17 Tahun 2023,  Pedoman dan Tata Tertib Kerja Dewan Komisaris mengatur hal-hal sebagai berikut:

- 1. Ketentuan Umum;
- 2. Organisasi;
- 3. Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab;
- 4. Rapat Dewan Komisaris;
- 5. Rapat Koordinasi Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi;
- 6. Fokus Pengawasan dan Rekomendasi Dewan Komisaris;
- 7. Benturan Kepentingan; serta
- 8. Lain-lain dan Penutup.

Selain  itu,  anggota  Dewan  Komisaris  juga  berkewajiban untuk  menyampaikan  informasi  kepada  Bank  mengenai kepemilikan dan setiap perubahan kepemilikan atas saham Bank.

## Jumlah, Komposisi, dan Independensi Dewan Komisaris

## Jumlah

Anggota Dewan Komisaris Bank berjumlah 4 (empat) orang. Dari  4  (empat)  orang  anggota  Dewan  Komisaris  tersebut, Bank  memiliki  3  (tiga)  orang  Komisaris  Independen  atau sekitar 75%. Jumlah tersebut tidak melampaui jumlah Direksi, yaitu  sebanyak  5  (lima)  orang,  sehingga  sudah  memenuhi ketentuan Otoritas Jasa Keuangan.

## Komposisi

Pengangkatan Dewan Komisaris menjadi wewenang RUPS.  Seluruh  anggota  Dewan  Komisaris  Bank  telah memenuhi kriteria sebagai Dewan Komisaris, sesuai

144

The  Board  of  Commissioners  is  the  governance  organ of  the  Bank  which  has  the  duties  and  responsibilities  to carry out general and/or specific supervision in accordance with the Articles of Association and provide advice to the Board  of  Directors  on  the  implementation  of  the  Board of  Directors'  duties  and  responsibilities.  The  Board  of Commissioners also plays an active role in monitoring the effectiveness of governance implementation in the Bank's business activities at all levels of the Bank's organization.

## Board of Commissioners Charter

The Board of Commissioners has a Board of Commissioners Charter, prepared based on the Bank's Articles of Association and applicable laws and regulations. Pursuant to  POJK  No.  17  on  2023,    the  Board  of  Commissioners Charter regulates the following matters:

- 1. General Requirements;
- 2. Organization;
- 3. Duties and Responsibilities;
- 4. Board of Commissioners' Meeting;
- 5. Coordination Meeting of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors;
- 6. Focus  of  Supervision  and  Recommendations  of  the Board of Commissioners;
- 7. Conflicts of Interest; and
- 8. Others and Closing.

Furthermore, members of the Board of Commissioners are also required to submit information to the Bank regarding ownership and any changes of ownership of the Bank's shares.

## Number, Composition, and Independence of the Board of Commissioners

## Number

The Board of Commissioners of the Bank consists of 4 (four) members.  Of  the  4  (four)  members,  3  (three)  members or  around  75%  are  Independent  Commissioners.  This number does not exceed the number of Board of Directors, consisting of 5 (five) members, and therefore, it meets the provisions of the Financial Services Authority.

## Composition

The  appointment  of  Board  of  Commissioners  is  under the  authority  of  the  GMS.  All  members  of  the  Bank's Board  of  Commissioners  have  met  the  criteria  as  Board

dengan  ketentuan  yang  berlaku  pada  Anggaran  Dasar Bank,  Pedoman  dan  Tata  Tertib  Kerja  Dewan  Komisaris, ketentuan perundang-undangan yang berlaku, serta telah melalui uji kemampuan dan kepatutan ( fit and proper test ) dari Bank Indonesia atau Otoritas Jasa Keuangan. ## Independensi

Untuk  melindungi  kepentingan  seluruh  Pemegang  Saham dan Bank, Dewan Komisaris senantiasa bersikap independen dalam menjalankan tugas dan tanggung jawab serta terbebas  dari  kepentingan  pihak-pihak  tertentu.  Seluruh anggota Dewan Komisaris juga telah menandatangani surat pernyataan independensi yang telah didokumentasikan Bank dan telah dilaporkan kepada OJK. Hal ini merupakan bentuk komitmen independensi Dewan Komisaris sekaligus sebagai persyaratan pengajuan persetujuan OJK.

## Independency

To protect the interests of all Shareholders and the Bank, the  Board  of  Commissioners  is  always  independent  in carrying  out  its  duties  and  responsibilities,  and  is  free from the interests of certain parties. All members of the Board of Commissioners have also signed a statement of independence, documented by the Bank and reported to the OJK. This is a form of commitment to the independence of  the  Board  of  Commissioners  and  a  requirement  for submission of OJK approval.

PT Bank IBK Indonesia Tbk

<!-- image -->

Independensi  Dewan  Komisaris  juga  tercermin  dengan keberadaan  75%  (lebih  tiga  puluh  persen)  Komisaris Independen  Bank  dari  seluruh  jumlah  anggota  Dewan Komisaris. Selain itu, untuk mendukung independensinya, anggota Dewan Komisaris tidak melakukan hal-hal yang  dapat  mempengaruhi  sikap  bertindak  independen sebagaimana diatur dalam peraturan yang berlaku.

## Komisaris Independen

Bank  memiliki  3  (tiga)  Komisaris  Independen  atau  75% dari  total  4  (empat)  anggota  Dewan  Komisaris.  Dengan demikian,  Bank  telah  memenuhi  ketentuan  dalam  POJK No.  17  tahun  2023  tentang  Penerapan  Tata  Kelola  bagi Bank  Umum,  yang  mewajibkan  Bank  untuk  memiliki Komisaris  Independen  minimal  50%  dari  total  anggota Dewan Komisaris.

## Kriteria Komisaris Independen

Kriteria pengangkatan Komisaris Independen Bank sama halnya dengan persyaratan Dewan Komisaris NonIndependen, namun ditambah dengan aturan lain dalam POJK  No.  33/POJK.04/2014  tentang  Direksi  dan  Dewan Komisaris  Emiten  atau  Perusahaan  Publik,  sebagaimana diuraikan berikut:

The  independence  of  the  Board  of  Commissioners  is also  reflected  by  having  75%  (more  than  thirty  percent) of  Independent  Commissioners  from  the  total  number of members of the Board of Commissioners. In addition, to  support  independence,  the  Board  of  Commissioners' members  refrain  from  engaging  themselves  in  activities that  may  affect  their  ability  to  act  independently  as stipulated in the applicable regulations.

## Independent Commissioner

The Bank has 3 (three) Independent Commissioners or  75%  of  the  total  4  (four)  members  of  the  Board  of Commissioners.  Thus,  the  Bank  has  complied  with  the provisions of POJK No. 17 of 2023 on the Implementation of Governance for Commercial Banks, which requires the Bank to have Independent Commissioners of at least 50% of the total members of the Board of Commissioners.

## Pernyataan Independensi

Seluruh Komisaris Independen Bank telah menandatangani Surat Pernyataan Independensi dan lulus penilaian kemampuan dan kepatutan ( fit  and  proper  test )  sebagai Komisaris  Independen  sesuai  dengan  ketentuan  Otoritas Jasa Keuangan tentang penilaian kemampuan dan kepatutan ( fit and proper test ).

## Statement of Independence

All of the Bank's Independent Commissioners have signed a  Statement  of  Independence  and  passed  the  fit  and proper test as Independent Commissioners in accordance with the provisions of the Financial Services Authority on fit and proper test.

## Keberagaman Komposisi Dewan Komisaris

Penentuan komposisi Dewan Komisaris Bank dilaksanakan dengan memperhatikan keberagaman keahlian, pengetahuan, pengalaman, dan usia yang dibutuhkan Bank dalam mendukung  kegiatan  usaha dalam  industri  perbankan  maupun  status  Bank  sebagai perusahaan terbuka sesuai dengan Lampiran SEOJK No. 32/SEOJK.04/2015  tentang  Pedoman  Tata  Kelola Perusahaan Terbuka. Bank menerapkan nilai keberagaman dalam  keanggotaan  Dewan  Komisaris  dengan  tujuan agar  tercipta  keberagaman  solusi  dan  perspektif  dalam memecahkan  setiap  masalah  yang  dihadapi  Bank.  Nilai keberagaman dalam keanggotaan Dewan Komisaris Bank juga dapat mempermudah pengambilan keputusan secara tepat pada segala kondisi yang dihadapi Bank.

<!-- image -->

## Diversity of the Board of Commissioners' Composition

The Board of Commissioners' composition is determined by considering the diversity of skills, knowledge, experience, and age required by the Bank in order to support business activities  in  banking  industry  and  the  Bank's  status  as  a public company in accordance with SEOJK Appendix No. 32/SEOJK.04/2015  on  Governance  Guidelines  for  Public Companies.  The  Bank  applies  the  diversity  value  in  the Board  of  Commissioners'  composition  with  the  aim  of creating a diversity of solutions and perspectives in solving every problem faced by the Bank. The diversity value in the Board of Commissioners' composition facilitates in making the right decisions in all conditions faced by the Bank.

## Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab Dewan Komisaris

Secara umum, tugas dan tanggung jawab Dewan Komisaris Bank meliputi:

- 1. Setiap anggota Dewan Komisaris tidak boleh bertindak secara individual dan  akan  bertindak  berdasarkan keputusan Dewan Komisaris;
- 2. Dewan  Komisaris akan melaksanakan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya dengan iktikad baik, dengan penuh tanggung jawab, kehati-hatian, dan independensi;
- 3. Dewan  Komisaris  harus  memastikan  bahwa  prinsipprinsip  tata  kelola  Perusahaan  yang  Baik  diterapkan dalam seluruh aktivitas  bisnis  Bank  dan  seluruh  level organisasi setidaknya melalui:

## Duties and Responsibilities of the Board of Commissioners

In  general,  duties  and  responsibilities  of  the  Board  of Commissioners of the Bank include:

- 1. Each member of the Board of Commissioners must not act individually and will act based on the decision of the Board of Commissioners;
- 2. The Board of Commissioners will perform its duties and responsibilities  in  good  faith,  responsi-bly,  prudently, and independently;
- 3. The Board of Commissioners must ensure that good corporate governance principles are ap-plied in all Bank business  activities  and  at  all  organizational  levels  at least through:

<!-- image -->

PT Bank IBK Indonesia Tbk 2023 Annual Report and Sustainability Report 147

<!-- image -->

- a. Pelaksanaan  tugas  dan  tanggung  jawab  Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi;
- b. Kelengkapan  dan  pelaksanaan  tugas  Komite  dan Unit  Kerja  saat  menjalankan  tugas  Bank  fungsi kontrol internal;
- c. Implementasi fungsi kepatuhan audit internal  dan eksternal;
- d. Penerapan manajemen risiko termasuk tindak pengendalian internal;
- e. Pemberian dana kepada pihak terkait dan penyediaan dana besar;
- f. Rencana Strategis Bank;
- g. Transparansi kondisi keuangan dan non-keuangan Bank; serta
- h. Persetujuan  dan  tinjauan  berkala  terhadap  Visi, Misi, dan Nilai-Nilai Inti Bank;
- 4. Dewan Komisaris akan mengawasi kebijakan manajemen,  proses  manajemen  secara  umum,  dan bertanggung jawab atas pengawasan ini,  serta  akan memberikan saran kepada jajaran Direksi;
- 5. Dalam  melakukan  tugas  pengawasan  sebagaimana dimaksud  dalam  angka  (3)  dan  (4)  di  atas,  Dewan Komisaris wajib mengarahkan, memantau, dan mengevaluasi  kebijakan  strategis  Bank  implementasi sesuai dengan peraturan;
- 6. Dalam hal hanya ada seorang anggota Dewan Komisaris, segala tugas dan wewenang yang diberikan kepada Komisaris Utama atau anggota Dewan Komisaris dalam Anggaran Dasar berlaku pula baginya;
- 7. Dewan  Komisaris  dilarang  ikut  serta  pengambilan keputusan terkait operasional Bank, kecuali untuk:
- a. Ketentuan pinjaman kepada pihak terkait sebagaimana diatur dalam peraturan OJK tentang Batas  Maksimum  Pemberian  Kredit  untuk  Bank Umum; dan
- b. Hal-hal lain yang ditentukan dalam Anggaran Dasar atau  dalam  peraturan  dan  perundang-undangan yang berlaku;
- 8. Pengambilan keputusan oleh Dewan Komisaris sebagaimana dimaksud pada angka (7) di atas merupakan  bagian  dari  fungsi  pengawasan  Dewan Komisaris  agar  tidak  meniadakan  tanggung  jawab Direksi atas manajemen Bank;
- 9. Dewan Komisaris menyetujui dan memantau pelaksanaan strategi Bank, Rencana Bisnis (RBB), dan beberapa  kebijakan  sesuai  dengan  peraturan  yang berlaku,  termasuk  pembentukan  dan  implementasi strategi terkait AntiFraud , Anti Pencucian Uang dan Memerangi  Pembiayaan Terorisme (AMLCFT), Pelaporan Pelanggaran, Tata Kelola Perusahaan Terintegrasi, Transaksi Pihak Terkait (RPT), Batas Maksimum  Pemberian  Kredit  (BMPK),  dan  strategi Bank lainnya sesuai dengan ketentuan yang berlaku;
- 10. Melalui Komite Remunerasi dan Nominasi, mengawasi pemilihan  dan  penilaian  calon  anggota  Direksi  dan Dewan Komisaris tanpa intervensi;

- a. Implementation of duties and responsibilities of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors;

- c. Implementation  of  compliance  function,  internal and external audits;
- d. Implementation  of  risk  management,  including internal control measures;

- h. Periodic approval and review of the Bank's Vision, Mission, and Core Values;
- 4. The Board of Commissioners will supervise management policies, general management processes, and be responsible for this supervision, as well as provide advice to the Board of Direc-tors;
- 5. In performing supervisory duties as referred to in point (3) and (4) above, the Board of Commis-sioners must direct, monitor, and evaluate the Bank's strategic policy implementation pursuant to the regulations;

- b. Other matters specified in the Articles of Association or in applicable laws and regulations;
- 8. Decision  making  by  the  Board  of  Commissioners  as referred to in point (7) above is part of the supervisory function of the Board of Commissioners so as not to negate  the  Board  of  Directors'  responsibility  for  the Bank's management;
- 9. The  Board  of  Commissioners  approves  and  monitors the implementation of the Bank's strate-gies, Business Plan (RBB), and several policies in accordance with the applicable  regulations,  in-cluding  the  establishment and  implementation  of  strategies  related  to  AntiFraud, Anti-Money Laundering and Counter-Terrorism Financing (AML-CTF), Whistleblowing, Integrated Corporate Governance, Related Party Transactions (RPT),  Legal  Lending  Limit  (LLL),  and  the  Bank  other strategis in line with applicable regulations;
- 10. Through  Remuneration  and  Nomination  Committee, supervises the selection and assessment of candidates for the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners, without intervening;

- 24. Dewan Komisaris dapat melakukan tindakan manajemen Bank dalam keadaan tertentu dan untuk jangka  waktu  tertentu.  Dalam  hal  demikian,  semua ketentuan mengenai hak, wewenang, dan tanggung jawab  Direksi  kepada  Bank  dan  pihak  ketiga  akan berlaku untuk Dewan Komisaris;
- 25. Dewan Komisaris setiap saat dalam jam kerja, berhak memasuki gedung, pekarangan, atau bangunan lain  yang  digunakan  atau  dikendalikan  oleh  Bank, dan berhak memeriksa semua akun, surat, dan bukti lainnya untuk mengaudit dan memverifikasi uang tunai dan kondisi keuangan lainnya, serta untuk mengetahui semua tindakan yang diambil oleh Direksi;
- 26. Dewan  Komisaris  memiliki  hak  untuk  memperoleh penjelasan tentang semua hal yang berkaitan dengan operasi  Bank  serta  hal-hal  yang  berkaitan  dengan standar etika Bank;
- 27. Dewan  Komisaris  harus  memastikan  bahwa  Direksi memiliki dan melaksanakan rencana Literasi Keuangan dan Inklusi Keuangan terhadap masyarakat atau nasabah;
- 28. Dewan  Komisaris  harus  menyiapkan  rencana  suksesi untuk Chief Executive Officer (CEO)/Presiden Direktur dan manajemen  utama  untuk  memastikan  kepemimpinan Bank yang berkelanjutan di masa depan; serta
- 28. Menyelenggarakan  rapat  secara  berkala  minimal  4 (empat) kali dalam setahun dan di antaranya 2 (dua) kali rapat harus dihadiri lengkap oleh seluruh anggota Dewan Komisaris.

- 24. The  Board  of  Commissioners  may  undertake  Bank management actions under certain circum-stances and for a certain period of time. - 25. The  Board  of  Commissioners  is,  at  all  times  within office hours, entitled to enter the buildings, yards, or other structures used or controlled by the Bank, and is entitled to examine all ac-counts, letters, and other evidences, to audit and verify cash and other financial conditions, as well as to find out all actions taken by the Board of Directors;
- 26. The  Board  of  Commissioners  has  the  right  to  obtain explanations  on  all  matters  relating  to  the  Bank's operations  and  matters  relating  to  the  Bank's  ethical standards;
- 27. The  Board  of  Commissioners  must  ensure  that  the Board of Directors possesses and implements Financial Literacy and Financial Inclusion plans for the community or customers;
- 28. The Board of Commissioners must prepare a succession plan  for  the  Chief  Executive  Officer  (CEO)/President Director  and  key  management  to  ensure  the  Bank's sustainable future leader-ship; and
- 28. Hold periodic meetings at least 4 (four) times a year, of which 2 (two) meetings must be fully attended by all members of the Board of Commissioners.

## Keputusan yang Perlu Mendapat Persetujuan Dewan Komisaris

Keputusan-keputusan yang memerlukan persetujuan Dewan  Komisaris diatur dalam POJK  No. 17 tahun 2023  tentang  Penerapan  Tata  Kelola  bagi  Bank  Umum sebagaimana diuraikan berikut:

- 1. Dewan  Komisaris  dilarang  untuk  ikut  serta  dalam pengambilan  keputusan  untuk  kegiatan  operasional Bank, kecuali:
- a. Penyediaan dana kepada pihak terkait sebagaimana diatur dalam ketentuan mengenai batas maksimum pemberian kredit bank umum; dan
- b. Hal-hal lain yang  ditetapkan dalam  Anggaran Dasar  Bank  atau  peraturan  perundang-undangan yang berlaku; serta
- 2. Pengambilan  keputusan  kegiatan  operasional  Bank oleh Dewan Komisaris sebagaimana dimaksud di atas merupakan  bagian dari tugas pengawasan oleh Dewan Komisaris sehingga tidak meniadakan tanggung jawab Direksi atas pelaksanaan kepengurusan Bank.

## Pelaksanaan Tugas Pengawasan Dewan Komisaris

Sepanjang tahun 2023, Dewan  Komisaris Bank telah melakukan  berbagai  pengawasan  yang  ditujukan  untuk menunjang operasional dan pencapaian target Bank sebagaimana diuraikan berikut:

- 1. Sepanjang tahun 2023, Dewan Komisaris telah membuat Laporan Pengawasan Rencana Bisnis Perusahaan  Semester  I-2023  dan  Semester  II-2023 kepada OJK;
- 2. Dewan  Komisaris telah melaksanakan tugas dan tanggung jawab sesuai  dengan  pilar-pilar  tata  kelola secara independen, sebagaimana telah diatur dengan aturan  hukum,  kebijakan,  dan  perundang-undangan yang terkait;
- 3. Sesuai  fungsi,  tugas,  dan  tanggung  jawab,  Dewan Komisaris telah menjalankan fungsi pengawasan dan pemberian nasihat dengan memberikan masukan serta

## Decisions Requiring Approval from the Board of Commissioners

Decisions that require approval from the Board of Commissioners are stipulated in POJK No. 17 of 2023 on Governance  Implementation  for  Commercial  Banks  are described as follows:

- 1. The Board of Commissioners is prohibited from taking part  in  decision  making  for  the  Bank's  operational activities, unless:
- a. Provision  of  fund  to  related  party  as  stipulated in  the  provisions  regarding  legal  lending  limit  for commercial bank; and
- b. Other  matters specified in the Bank's Articles of Association or in the applicable laws and regulations; and
- 2. Decision making on Bank operational activities by the Board  of  Commissioners  as  referred  to  in  the  above is  part  of  the  supervisory  function  of  the  Board  of Commissioners  and  does  not  negate  the  Board  of Directors' responsibility for the implementation of Bank management.

## Implementation of the Board of Commissioners' Supervisory Duty

Throughout 2023, the Board of Commissioners carried out various  supervisions  aimed  at  supporting  operations  and achieving the Bank's targets, as follows:

- 1. Throughout 2023, the Board of Commissioners prepared  a  Supervision  Report  on  the  Company's Business Plan for Semester I of 2023 and Semester II of 2023 to OJK;
- 2. The Board of Commissioners carried out its duties and responsibilities  independently  in  accordance  with  the governance pillars, as stipulated by the relevant laws, policies, and regulations;
- 3. In accordance with its functions, duties, and responsibilities,  the  Board  of  Commissioners  carried out the supervisory and advisory functions, by

- rekomendasi  mengenai  pelaksanaan  rencana  bisnis dan pencapaian target Bank; serta
- 4. Selain itu, pengawasan aktif Dewan Komisaris terlihat dalam pelaksanaan rapat koordinasi bersama Direksi, maupun komite-komite. Untuk membantu tugas dalam rangka  pengawasan terhadap jalannya  Bank,  Dewan Komisaris  telah  membentuk  Komite  Audit,  Komite Remunerasi  dan  Nominasi,  serta  Komite  Pemantau Risiko.

## Program Orientasi bagi Komisaris Baru

Program  orientasi  bagi  anggota  Dewan  Komisaris  yang baru  bertujuan  agar  anggota  Dewan  Komisaris  tersebut dapat  lebih  mengenal  serta  memahami  Bank.  Melalui program pengenalan ini, anggota Dewan Komisaris baru diberikan  informasi  terkait  Visi,  Misi,  sejarah,  struktur korporasi,  budaya  Bank,  serta  informasi  penting  lainnya mengenai  Bank  yang  dikoordinasikan oleh Sekretaris Perusahaan.  Pada  tahun  2023,  Bank  tidak  melakukan program orientasi mengingat komposisi Dewan Komisaris pada tahun 2023 tidak mengalami perubahan.

## Pelatihan dan Pengembangan Kompetensi Dewan Komisaris

Dewan Komisaris senantiasa mengikuti berbagai program pelatihan dan pengembangan kompetensi dalam rangka meningkatkan kemampuan dan pemahaman yang dapat menunjang pelaksanaan tugas dan tanggung jawab secara optimal. Informasi mengenai program pelatihan dan pengembangan kompetensi Dewan Komisaris sepanjang tahun 2023 diuraikan sebagai berikut:

<!-- image -->

- providing  input  and  recommendations  regarding  the implementation of business plans and achievement of the Bank's targets; and
- 4. In addition, active supervision by the Board of Commissioners is evidenced in the implementation of coordination meetings with the Board of Directors and committees. To assist the duty in monitoring the Bank operation, the Board of Commissioners has established an  Audit  Committee,  Remuneration  and  Nomination Committee, and Risk Monitoring Committee.

## Orientation Program for New Commissioners

The orientation program for new members of the Board of Commissioners aims to enable the members of the Board of Commissioners to get to know and understand the Bank better. Through the orientation program, new members of the Board of Commissioners are provided with information regarding the Vision, Mission, history, corporate structure, culture of the Bank, and other important information about the Bank, which is coordinated by the Corporate Secretary. In 2023, the Bank did not carry out an orientation program considering that there were no changes to the composition of the Board of Commissioners in 2023.

## Penilaian Kinerja Komite yang Mendukung Pelaksanaan Tugas Dewan Komisaris

Dewan  Komisaris  secara  periodik  melakukan  penilaian kinerja terhadap Komite-Komite yang mendukung pelaksanaan tugas Dewan Komisaris, yaitu Komite Audit, Komite Remunerasi dan Nominasi, serta Komite Pemantau Risiko. Penilaian kinerja ini merupakan bagian dari upaya Bank untuk mengevaluasi dan meningkatkan kinerja masing-masing Komite untuk periode berikutnya.

## Prosedur dan Kriteria Penilaian Kinerja Komite Audit

Prosedur penilaian kinerja Komite Audit dilakukan berdasarkan pelaksanaan tugasnya dalam membantu Dewan  Komisaris  melakukan  fungsi  pengawasan  Bank terkait melakukan evaluasi perencanaan dan pelaksanaan audit,  serta  memantau  tindak  lanjut  hasil  audit  guna menilai kecukupan pengendalian internal, kecukupan proses pelaporan keuangan, serta pemberian rekomendasi mengenai penunjukan Akuntan Publik dan Kantor Akuntan Publik.

154

PT Bank IBK Indonesia Tbk Laporan Tahunan dan Laporan Keberlanjutan

## Performance Assessment of Committees Supporting the Implementation of Board of Commissioners' Duties

The Board of Commissioners periodically assesses the performance of Committees supporting the implementation of Board of Commissioners' duties, namely the Audit Committee, Remuneration and Nomination Committee, and Risk Monitoring Committee. The performance assessment is part of the Bank's efforts to evaluate and improve the performance of each Committee for the next period.

## Audit Committee Performance Assessment Procedures and Criteria

Procedures to assess the performance  of the Audit Committee are carried out based on the implementation of  its  duties  in  assisting  the  Board  of  Commissioners  in carrying out the supervisory function of the Bank in relation to evaluating audit planning and implementation, as well as monitoring the follow-up of audit results to assess the adequacy  of  internal  control,  the  adequacy  of  financial reporting process, as well as providing recommendations regarding  the  appointment  of  a  Public  Accountant  and Public Accounting Firm.

Kriteria yang  digunakan  melakukan  penilaian  melalui efektivitas  kerja  berdasarkan  rekomendasi  atas  hal-hal yang terkait dengan kualitas informasi keuangan, sistem pengendalian  internal,  efektivitas pemeriksaan  auditor eksternal dan internal, efektivitas pelaksanaan manajemen risiko,  serta  kepatuhan  terhadap  peraturan  perundangundangan yang berlaku.

Berdasarkan prosedur dan penilaian kinerja tersebut, Dewan Komisaris menilai, sepanjang tahun 2023, Komite Audit  telah  menjalankan  tugas  dan  tanggung  jawabnya dengan  baik.  Komite  Audit  telah  melaksanakan  rapat sebanyak  9  (sembilan)  kali  dan  menjalankan  tugasnya sebagaimana diuraikan berikut:

- 1. Penyampaian rekomendasi dan saran perbaikan kepada Manajemen,  baik  dalam  forum  Rapat  Komite  Audit maupun  dalam  diskusi-diskusi  internal,  sebagaimana tercantum  dalam  Nota  Rekomendasi  Komite,  Risalah Rapat/ Minute of Meeting , maupun Laporan Triwulanan Komite;
- 2. Penelaahan  dan  pemberian  rekomendasi  atas  usulan Direksi  yang  membutuhkan  persetujuan  tertulis  dari Dewan  Komisaris  yang  hasilnya  disampaikan  dalam bentuk Nota Rekomendasi kepada Dewan Komisaris, seperti  usulan  KAP  yang  akan  melaksanakan  audit Laporan  Keuangan  Konsolidasian  Tahun  Buku  2023, draft  Annual  Audit  Plan Tahun  Buku  2023  beserta revisinya, dan usulan Pengendali Mutu Independen dari Pihak  Ekstern  Independen  yang  akan  melaksanakan kaji ulang terhadap kinerja Internal Audit Tahun Buku 2023;
- 3. Penyusunan laporan-laporan yang wajib disusun oleh Komite Audit untuk disampaikan kepada Dewan  Komisaris,  antara  lain  Laporan  Hasil  Evaluasi Pelaksanaan Pemberian Jasa Audit atas Laporan Keuangan  Konsolidasian  Tahun  Buku  2023,  Laporan Kegiatan Komite Audit Triwulanan, dan Laporan Hasil Kunjungan; serta
- 4. Menjalin komunikasi dan koordinasi dengan unit-unit kerja  di  Bank  untuk  membahas  isu-isu  yang  menjadi perhatian dan fokus Komite Audit, antara lain melalui diskusi maupun penyampaian laporan.

## Prosedur dan Kriteria Penilaian Kinerja Komite Remunerasi dan Nominasi

Prosedur penilaian kinerja Komite Remunerasi dan Nominasi  dilakukan  berdasarkan  efektivitas  pelaksanaan kinerja untuk membantu Dewan Komisaris melaksanakan fungsi nominasi dan remunerasi. Adapun kriteria penilaian mencakup  pencapaian  realisasi  rencana  kerja,  kualitas rekomendasi, serta kualitas komunikasi. Berdasarkan prosedur dan kriteria penilaian tersebut, Dewan Komisaris menilai,  selama  tahun  2023,  Komite  Remunerasi  dan Nominasi  dinilai  telah  menjalankan  tugas  dan  tanggung jawabnya dengan baik.

<!-- image -->

The criteria used to evaluate work effectiveness are based on  recommendations  on  matters  related  to  the  quality of  financial  information,  internal  control  systems,  audit effectiveness of external and internal auditor, effectiveness of risk management implementation, and compliance with applicable laws and regulations.

Based on such procedures and performance assessments, the Board of Commissioners considered that, throughout 2023,  the  Audit  Committee  carried  out  its  duties  and responsibilities properly. The Audit Committee held 9 (nine) meetings and carried out its duties as described below:

- 1. Submission of recommendations and suggestions for improvement to the Management, both in the Audit Committee Meeting forum and in internal discussions, as stated in the Committee's Recommendation Notes, Minutes  of  Meeting,  and  the  Committee's  Quarterly Reports;
- 2. Review and provision of recommendations on the Board of  Directors  'proposals  that  require  written  approval from the Board of Commissioners, subsequently submitted  in  the  form  of  Recommendation  Notes  to the Board of Commissioners, such as KAP proposals to carry out an audit of the 2023 Consolidated Financial Statements, draft of the 2023 Annual Audit Plan and its  revisions,  and  proposal  of  an  Independent Quality Controller from an Independent External Party who will review the Internal Audit performance in 2023;
- 3. Compilation  of  reports  that  must  be  prepared  by the  Audit  Committee  to  be  submitted  to  the  Board of  Commissioners,  including  Reports  on  Evaluation Results of Audit Services Implementation for the 2023 Consolidated  Financial  Statements,  Quarterly  Audit Committee Activity Reports, and Reports on the Results of Visit; and
- 4. Establishment  of communication  and  coordination with  units  in  the  Bank  to  discuss  issues  that  are  of concern and focus of the Audit Committee, including through discussion and submission of reports.

## Procedures and Criteria for Remuneration and Nomination Committee's Performance Assessment

The procedure to assess the Remuneration and Nomination Committee's  performance  is  based  on  the  effectiveness of  performance in assisting  the  Board  of  Commissioners regarding  nomination  and  remuneration  functions.  The assessment criteria include the achievement of work plan realization,  quality  of  recommendations,  and  quality  of communication.  Based  on  such  assessment  procedures and  criteria, the Board  of  Commissioners  considered that,  during  2023,  the  Remuneration  and  Nomination Committee  carried out its duties and  responsibilities properly.

## Prosedur dan Kriteria Penilaian Kinerja Komite Pemantau Risiko

Prosedur penilaian kinerja Komite Pemantau Risiko dilakukan  berdasarkan  efektivitas  pelaksanaan  tugasnya dalam membantu Dewan Komisaris melaksanakan fungsi  dan  tanggung  jawab  terkait  pengawasan  dan evaluasi pelaksanaan Kebijakan Manajemen Risiko serta  pemberian  rekomendasi  kepada  Dewan  Komisaris untuk  memastikan  penerapan  manajemen  risiko  yang memadai agar bank terlindungi dari risiko yang dihadapi. Adapun kriteria penilaian mencakup kualitas laporan dan rekomendasi  yang  disampaikan  Komite  Pemantau  Risiko terkait pelaksanaan dan kecukupan sistem dan kebijakan manajemen risiko Bank untuk dapat dilaksanakan secara sistematis, efektif, dan efisien agar dapat memaksimalkan nilai kinerja Bank sehingga sesuai dengan rencana strategis Bank serta kebijakan manajemen  risiko Bank secara keseluruhan. Berdasarkan prosedur dan kriteria penilaian tersebut,  Dewan  Komisaris  menilai,  selama  tahun  2023, Komite  Pemantau  Risiko  dinilai  telah  menjalankan  tugas dan tanggung jawabnya dengan baik.

## Procedures and Criteria for Risk Monitoring Committee's Performance Assessment

The procedure to assess the Risk Monitoring Committee's performance  is  based  on  the  effectiveness  of  duties  in assisting the Board of Commissioners regarding the functions and responsibilities related to monitoring and  evaluation of the Risk Management  Policy  and recommendations  to  the  Board  of  Commissioners  to ensure adequacy of risk management so that the Bank is protected from the risks. The assessment criteria include the quality of reports and recommendations submitted by the Risk Monitoring Committee regarding the implementation and adequacy of the Bank's risk management system and policies  to  be  carried  out  systematically,  effectively,  and efficiently,  in  order  to  maximize  the  Bank's  performance value, to be in accordance with the Bank's strategic plan, and  the  overall  risk  management  policy  of  the  Bank. Based  on  such  assessment  procedures  and  criteria,  the Board  of  Commissioners  considered  that,  during  2023, the Risk Monitoring Committee carried out its duties and responsibilities properly.

## Penilaian Kinerja Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris

Performance Assessment of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners

Penilaian  terhadap  kinerja  Direksi  dan  Dewan  Komisaris, baik secara individual maupun kolektif, dilakukan Bank secara rutin sesuai dengan ketentuan POJK No. 21/POJK.04/2015 tentang Penerapan Pedoman Tata Kelola Perusahaan Terbuka dan SEOJK No. 32/SEOJK.04/2015  tentang  Pedoman  Tata  Kelola Perusahaan  Terbuka.  Selain  sebagai  bentuk  evaluasi  dan peningkatan  kualitas kinerja, penilaian kinerja Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris juga menjadi bentuk implementasi akuntabilitas pelaksanaan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya.

## Penilaian Kinerja Direksi

## Prosedur dan Pihak yang Melakukan Penilaian Kinerja Direksi

Penilaian kinerja Direksi dilakukan Bank sedikitnya 1 (satu) kali  dalam  setahun  dengan  melakukan  perhitungan  KPI ( Key  Performance  Indicator ).  Metode  penilaian  tersebut dilakukan melalui penilaian sendiri ( self-assessment ), Dewan  Komisaris  sebagai  wakil  dari  Pemegang  Saham, RUPS, serta Otoritas Jasa Keuangan (OJK) melalui Penilaian

156

PT Bank IBK Indonesia Tbk Laporan Tahunan dan Laporan Keberlanjutan

Performance  of  the  Board  of  Directors  and  Board  of Commissioners,  both  individually and  collectively, are periodically assessed by the Bank, in accordance with the provisions  of  POJK  No.  21/POJK.04/2015  on  Implementation of Governance  Guidelines  for  Public  Companies  and SEOJK No. 32/SEOJK.04/2015 on Governance Guidelines for  Public  Companies.  In  addition  to  being  a  form  of evaluation and improvement for the performance quality, the performance assessment of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners is also a form of accountability in carrying out their duties and responsibilities.

## Performance Assessment of the Board of Directors

## Procedures for Board of Directors' Performance Assessment and the Asessor

The Bank assesses the Board of Directors' performance at least once a year by calculating the KPI (Key Performance Indicator). The assessment method is carried out by the selfassessment, the Board of Commissioners as representative of  Shareholders,  the  GMS,  and  the  Financial  Services Authority  (OJK)  through  the  Rating  of  Bank  Soundness

Tingkat Kesehatan Bank dan tata kelola. dengan Adapun prosedur penilaiannya diuraikan sebagai berikut:

- 1. Penerapan tugas dan tanggung jawab setiap anggota Direksi berdasarkan Anggaran Dasar Bank;
- 2. Penerapan  hasil  keputusan  Rapat  Umum  Pemegang Saham; serta
- 3. Realisasi Rencana Bisnis Bank (RBB).

## Kriteria Penilaian Kinerja Direksi

Kriteria  yang  menjadi  tolok  ukur  dalam  penilaian  kinerja Direksi meliputi pencapaian Tingkat Kesehatan Bank yang mencakup aspek sebagai berikut:

- 1. Meningkatnya posisi Loan to Funding Ratio (LFR);
- 2. Meningkatnya pertumbuhan Ekuitas; serta
- 3. Mempertahankan Tingkat Kesehatan Bank.

## Penilaian Kinerja Dewan Komisaris

## Prosedur dan Pihak yang Melakukan Penilaian Kinerja Dewan Komisaris

Penilaian  kinerja  Dewan  Komisaris  dilakukan  Bank  sedikitnya 1 (satu) kali dalam setahun melalui metode penilaian sendiri ( self-assessment ) dengan melakukan perhitungan KPI ( Key Performance Indicator ).  Adapun prosedur penilaiannya diuraikan sebagai berikut:

- 1. Menetapkan  aspek-aspek  pengawasan,  seperti  profil risiko, tata kelola, rentabilitas, dan permodalan Bank;
- 2. Melakukan penilaian dengan metode self-assessment ;
- 3. Melaporkan  hasil  penilaian  Dewan  Komisaris  dalam RUPS; serta
- 4. Memperoleh hasil pertanggungjawaban diterima/ ditolak oleh RUPS.

## Kriteria Penilaian Kinerja Dewan Komisaris

Kriteria  yang  menjadi  tolok  ukur  dalam  penilaian  kinerja Dewan Komisaris lebih lengkap diuraikan sebagai berikut:

- 1. Penyusunan  Rencana  Kerja  dan  Anggaran  Dewan Komisaris;
- 2. Pemberian tanggapan atau rekomendasi perihal Rencana Kerja dan Anggaran Bank, Laporan Tahunan dan Laporan Keberlanjutan, Analisis Kinerja Triwulanan, dan Rencana Bisnis Bank;
- 3. Pemberian  nasihat  dan  persetujuan  kepada  Direksi; serta
- 4. Kehadiran dalam Rapat Dewan Komisaris.

<!-- image -->

and governance assessment. The assessment procedures are described as follows:

- 1. Implementation of duties and responsibilities of each member of the Board of Directors, which is based on the Bank's Articles of Association;
- 2. Implementation of the General Meeting of Shareholders resolutions; and
- 3. Realization of Bank Business Plan (RBB).

## Board of Directors' Performance Assessment Criteria

The  criteria  that  serve  as  benchmarks  in  assessing  the Board  of  Directors'  performance  include  achieving  the Bank's Soundness Level and the following aspects:

- 1. Increasing Loan to Funding Ratio (LFR) position;
- 2. Increasing Equity growth; and
- 3. Maintaining the Bank's soundness level.

## Board of Commissioners' Performance Assessment

## Procedures for Board of Commissioners' Performance Assessment and the Asessor

The Bank assesses the Board of Commissioners' performance at least once a year through a self-assessment method  by  calculating  KPI  (Key  Performance  Indicator). The assessment procedure is described as follows:

- 1. Identify supervisory aspects, such as risk profile, governance, profitability, and Bank capital;
- 2. Conduct assessment using the self-assessment method;
- 3. Report the Board of Commissioners' assessment results at the GMS; and
- 4. Obtain  acceptance/rejection  on  the  accountability  by the GMS.

## Board of Commissioners' Performance Assessment Criteria

The criteria that serve as benchmarks in assessing the Board of Commissioners' performance are described as follows:

- 1. Preparation of the Work Plan and Budget of the Board of Commissioners;
- 2. Provision  of  feedback  or  recommendations  on  the Bank's Work Plan and Budget, Annual and Sustainability Report,  Quarterly  Performance  Analysis,  and  Bank Business Plan;
- 3. Provision  of  advice  and  approval  to  the  Board  of Directors; and
- 4. Attendance at Board of Commissioners' Meetings.

## Nominasi dan Remunerasi Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris

Nomination and Remuneration of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners

## Kebijakan Nominasi Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris

Pelaksanaan nominasi Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris merupakan bagian dari tugas dan tanggung jawab Komite Remunerasi dan Nominasi. Pada prosesnya Komite  Remunerasi  dan  Nominasi  akan  menyerahkan daftar nama calon anggota Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris dalam pelaksanaan rapat internal Dewan  Komisaris. Calon anggota Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris yang terpilih merupakan kandidat yang telah memenuhi kriteria Bank, seperti catatan pengalaman kerja, kinerja selama kandidat tersebut bekerja pada Bank, serta kemampuan teknis dan non-teknis.  Setelah  terpilih,  kandidat  tersebut  kemudian akan diangkat dalam pelaksanaan RUPS. Meskipun demikian, pihak yang diangkat sebagai Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris tersebut dilarang melaksanakan  tugas dan tanggung jawabnya sebagai Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris Bank sebelum memperoleh predikat lulus uji kemampuan dan kepatutan ( fit and proper test )  dari otoritas berwenang.

## Kebijakan Remunerasi Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris

## Dasar dan Kebijakan Remunerasi Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris

Kebijakan remunerasi Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris Bank berpedoman  pada  POJK  No.  45/POJK.03/2015  tentang Penerapan Tata Kelola dalam Pemberian Remunerasi bagi Bank Umum dan POJK No. 17 Tahun 2023 tentang Penerapan Tata Kelola bagi Bank Umum.

## Nomination Policy for the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners

Implementing nominations for the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners is part of the Remuneration and Nomination Committee's duties and responsibilities. In the process, the Remuneration and Nomination Committee will submit a list of candidates' name of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners during the internal meeting of the Board of Commissioners. Selected candidates for the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners are those who have met the Bank's criteria, such as work experience records, performance during the candidate's term of office at the Bank, and technical and non-technical abilities. Once selected,  the  candidates  will  then  be  appointed  at  the GMS. However, parties appointed as the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners are prohibited from carrying out their duties and responsibilities as the Bank's Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners before passing the fit and proper test from the competent authority.

## Remuneration Policy for the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners

## Basis and Policy of Remuneration for the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners

## Hubungan antara Remunerasi dengan Kinerja dan Risiko Bank

Bank  memberikan  remunerasi  yang  bersifat  variabel, yakni  remunerasi  yang  dikaitkan  dengan  kinerja  dan risiko, antara lain bonus. Remunerasi yang berupa bonus diberikan dalam bentuk tunai. Kebijakan Remunerasi yang bersifat variabel pada Bank, selain memperhatikan skala usaha,  kompleksitas  usaha, peer  group ,  tingkat  inflasi, kondisi,  dan  kemampuan  keuangan  Bank,  serta  tidak bertentangan  dengan  peraturan  perundang-undangan yang berlaku, juga diikuti dengan upaya Bank melakukan prudent risk taking .

## Relationship between Remuneration and Bank Performance and Risk

The Bank provides variable remuneration, namely remuneration  linked  to  performance  and  risk,  including bonuses. Remuneration in the form of bonuses is given in cash. Remuneration policies that are variable in the Bank, in addition to taking into account the business scale, business complexity,  peer  group,  inflation rate, condition  and financial capacity of the Bank, as well as not contradicting the applicable laws and regulations, are also complied by the Bank's efforts to carry out prudent risk taking.

## Rapat Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris

Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners Meetings

## Kebijakan Rapat

Dalam  melaksanakan  tugas  dan  tanggung  jawabnya, Direksi  dan  Dewan  Komisaris  wajib  melaksanakan  rapat secara  berkala.  Rapat  internal  Direksi  diselenggarakan paling sedikit 1 (satu) kali dalam setiap bulan, sedangkan rapat  Direksi  bersama  Dewan  Komisaris  diselenggarakan paling sedikit 1 (satu) kali dalam 4 (empat) bulan. Demikian pula,  rapat  internal  Dewan  Komisaris  diselenggarakan paling sedikit 1 (satu) kali dalam 2 (dua) bulan.

## Meeting Policy

In carrying out their duties and responsibilities, the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners are required to hold  regular  meetings.  Internal  meetings  of  the  Board of  Directors  are  held  at  least  once  a  month,  while  joint meetings  of  the  Board  of  Directors  and  the  Board  of Commissioners are held at least once every 4 (four) months. Whereas, internal meetings of the Board of Commissioners are held at least once in 2 (two) months.

## Hubungan Afiliasi Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris serta Pemegang Saham Utama dan Pengendali

Affiliate Relationship of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners as well as Main and Controlling Shareholders

Sesuai POJK No. 17 Tahun 2023 tentang Penerapan Tata Kelola  bagi  Bank  Umum,  Direksi  dan  Dewan  Komisaris dilarang saling memiliki hubungan keluarga sampai derajat kedua dengan sesama anggota Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris. Selain itu, organ tersebut juga diwajibkan untuk mengungkapkan  hubungan  keuangan  dan  hubungan keluarga  dengan  anggota  Direksi  dan  Dewan  Komisaris lain, serta Pemegang Saham Pengendali Bank. ## Komite di bawah Dewan Komisaris

## Committees under the Board of Commissioners

Pelaksanaan tugas dan tanggung jawab Dewan Komisaris dibantu dengan adanya Komite Audit, Komite Remunerasi dan  Nominasi,  serta  Komite  Pemantau  Risiko.  KomiteKomite  ini  akan  membantu  pelaksanaan  tugas  Dewan Komisaris,  mulai  dari  perumusan  strategi,  pemantauan serta pengawasan pelaksanaan strategi yang telah dirancang Bank, hingga evaluasi kinerja Bank.

## Komite Audit

Komite Audit merupakan komite yang mendukung Dewan Komisaris  dalam  melaksanakan  fungsi  pengawasan  di bidang pelaksanaan dan pelaporan pencatatan keuangan, kecukupan pengelolaan risiko, serta pengendalian internal secara efektif dan independen. Komite Audit juga melakukan pengawasan pada kepatuhan Bank terhadap peraturan dan perundang-undangan yang berlaku.

## Dasar Hukum

Pembentukan  Komite  Audit  didasarkan  pada  ketentuan sebagai berikut:

- 1. POJK No. 55/POJK.04/2015 tentang Pembentukan dan Pedoman Pelaksanaan Kerja Komite Audit;
- 2. POJK No. 33/POJK.04/2014 tentang Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris Emiten atau Perusahaan Publik; serta
- 3. POJK  No.  17  Tahun  2023  tentang  Penerapan  Tata Kelola Bagi Bank Umum.

## Pedoman Kerja Komite Audit

Bank telah memiliki Piagam Komite Audit untuk mengatur uraian tugas dan tanggung jawab, keanggotaan, prosedur kerja,  dan rapat mengenai pelaksanaan kegiatan Komite Audit. Piagam Komite Audit yang terakhir diperbarui pada 25 Mei 2022 ini diatur dalam Peraturan No. IX.I.5 tentang Pembentukan  dan  Pedoman  Pelaksanaan  Kerja  Komite Audit  yang  menjelaskan  tentang  tujuan  pembentukan Komite Audit, tugas dan tanggung jawab Komite Audit, serta pelaksanaan rapat Komite Audit.

## Struktur dan Keanggotaan Komite Audit

Susunan keanggotaan Komite Audit Bank per 31 Desember diuraikan sebagai berikut:

The  implementation  of  the  Board  of  Commissioners' duties and responsibilities is assisted by the Audit Committee,  Remuneration  and  Nomination  Committee, and Risk Monitoring Committee, starting from formulating strategies, monitoring and supervising the implementation of  strategies  designed  by  the  Bank,  to  evaluating  the Bank's performance.

## Audit Committee

The Audit Committee is a committee that assists the Board of  Commissioners  in  performing  supervisory  function  of effective and independent implementation and reporting of  financial  records,  adequacy  of  risk  management,  and internal control. The Audit Committee also supervises the Bank's compliance with the applicable laws and regulations.

## Legal Basis

The Audit Committee is established based on the following provisions:

- 1. POJK No. 55/POJK.04/2015 on Establishment and Work Implementation Guidelines of the Audit Committee;
- 2. POJK No. 33/POJK.04/2014 on the Board of Directors and  Board  of  Commissioners  of  Issuers  or  Public Companies; and
- 3. POJK No. 17 of 2023 on Implementation of Governance for Commercial Banks.

## Audit Committee Charter

The  Bank  has  established  an  Audit  Committee  Charter to regulate the descriptions of duties and responsibilities, membership,  work  procedures,  and  meetings  on  the implementation of Audit Committee's activities. The Audit Committee Charter, which was last updated on May 25, 2022, is set out in Regulation No. IX.I.5 on Establishment and Implementation of Audit Committee Charter, which describes the objective of establishing Audit Committee, the duties and responsibilities of Audit Committee, as well as the implementation of Audit Committee's meetings.

## Rapat Komite Audit

Komite Audit wajib melaksanakan rapat internal setidaknya 1  (satu)  kali  dalam  3  (tiga)  bulan  dengan  dipimpin  oleh Ketua  Komite  Audit.  Sepanjang  tahun  2023,  Komite Audit telah melaksanakan rapat sebanyak 9 (sembilan) kali dengan tingkat kehadiran sebagai berikut:

- c. Audit methodology, techniques, and facilities used by KAP;
- d. Expertise and experience of AP , KAP , and the audit team used by KAP;
- e. Benefit  of  fresh  eye  perspectives,  to  be  obtained through the replacement of AP , KAP , and the audit team from KAP;
- f. Potential  risk  of  using  audit  services  for  annual historical financial information from AP and/or KAP for a cumulative 7 (seven) years; and
- g. Evaluation results of audit service implementation for  annual  historical  financial  information  by  AP and KAP in the previous period;
- 8. The Audit Committee evaluates the implementation of audit services on annual historical fi-nancial information by AP and/or KAP, the evaluation at least includes:
- a. Conformity of audit implementation by AP and/or KAP with the applicable audit standards;
- b. Adequacy of time for field work;
- c. Review  the  scope  of  services  provided  and  the adequacy of sampling tests; and
- d. Recommendations  for  improvements  provided  by AP and/or KAP;
- 9. In performing its duties and responsibilities, the Audit Committee has full access to all required information/ data and obtains cooperation from Management and SKAI  and  has  the  authority  to  invite  every  Board  of Directors' member and Executive Officer;
- 10. Review  financial  information  issued  by  the  Issuers  or Public Companies;
- 11. Review compliance with laws and regulations relating to Company/Bank activities; and
- 12. Maintain the confidentiality of documents, data, and information of the Bank.

## Laporan Pelaksanaan Tugas Komite Audit

Sepanjang  tahun  2023,  Komite  Audit  Bank  IBK  telah melaksanakan tugas dalam melakukan pemantauan dan  evaluasi terhadap  perencanaan  dan  pelaksanaan audit.  Tugas  tersebut  meliputi  pemantauan  dan  evaluasi terhadap  pelaksanaan  tugas  SKAI,  tindak  lanjut  temuan audit internal dan audit eksternal, melakukan penelaahan terhadap  laporan  keuangan,  memberikan  rekomendasi atas penunjukan Kantor Akuntan Publik, dan memastikan pekerjaannya sesuai dengan standar yang berlaku. Pertemuan  untuk  perencanaan  dan  pelaksanaan  audit tersebut dilakukan setiap bulan dan hasilnya disampaikan kepada Dewan Komisaris sebagai rekomendasi. Selain itu, Komite Audit juga bertugas untuk menelaah ketaatan Bank atas  peraturan  yang  berlaku  dan  memberikan  pendapat independen dan profesional kepada Dewan Komisaris.

Dalam  melaksanakan tugasnya dan tanggung  jawab Komite Audit sebagaimana tertuang dalam Piagam Komite Audit, sepanjang tahun 2023, Komite Audit telah melaksanakan penelaahan dan pengawasan berikut:

- 1. Mengkaji dan melakukan klarifikasi atas seluruh informasi keuangan yang disajikan oleh manajemen;
- 2. Memantau dan mengkaji kepatuhan terhadap aturan terkait  pasar  modal  dan  aturan-aturan  lainnya  dari OJK  dan  BEI  serta  peraturan  perundang-undangan

## Report on the Implementation of Audit Committee's Duties

Throughout 2023, the Audit Committee of Bank IBK carried out its duties in monitoring and evaluating audit planning and implementation. These duties include monitoring and evaluating the implementation of SKAI's duties, following up on internal audit and external audit findings, reviewing financial  statements,  providing  recommendations  on  the appointment of a Public Accounting Firm, and ensuring that its duties are in accordance with the applicable standards. Meetings for planning and implementing the audit are held every month and the results are submitted to the Board of  Commissioners  as  recommendations.  In  addition,  the Audit Committee is also in charge of reviewing the Bank's compliance  with  applicable  regulations  and  providing independent  and  professional  opinions  to  the  Board  of Commissioners.

In carrying out the Audit Committee's duties and responsibilities as stated in the Audit Committee Charter, throughout  2023,  the  Audit  Committee  carried  out  the following reviews and supervision:

- 1. Reviewed and clarified all financial information presented by management;
- 2. Monitored and reviewed compliance with regulations related to the capital market and other regulations from OJK and IDX as well as laws and regulations related to

- yang  berhubungan  dengan  kegiatan  Bank  dengan mengadakan pertemuan secara berkala dengan Sekretaris Bank dan bagian Legal Bank;
- 3. Mengevaluasi  efektivitas  pengendalian  internal  dan pelaksanaan kegiatan serta hasil audit yang dilakukan oleh Audit Internal sepanjang Tahun 2023;
- 4. Mengkaji  dan  membahas  laporan  dari  hasil  proses audit dengan pihak Kantor Akuntan Publik (KAP) dan memantau  pihak  manajemen  dalam  menindaklanjuti hasil audit serta memastikan bahwa eksternal auditor telah  menyampaikan  seluruh  hal  yang  berhubungan dengan  standar  pemeriksaan  akuntan  publik  kepada manajemen; serta
- 5. Melakukan pertemuan dengan pihak Manajemen untuk  membahas  risiko  dan  masalah  yang  dihadapi dalam kegiatan operasional.

Dalam melaksanakan tugasnya, Komite Audit Bank memiliki wewenang  untuk  berkoordinasi  dan  bekerja sama dengan divisi-divisi lain yang ada di Bank, terutama dengan SKAI.

Sepanjang  tahun  2023,  Komite  Audit  telah  melaksanakan tugasnya berdasarkan permintaan/instruksi Dewan Komisaris. Jika  dalam  pelaksanaan  tugasnya  ditemukan  hal-hal  yang diperkirakan akan mengganggu kegiatan Bank maka Komite Audit akan melaporkannya kepada Dewan Komisaris tidak lebih dari 14 (empat belas) hari kerja.

## Komite Remunerasi dan Nominasi

Komite  Remunerasi  dan  Nominasi  merupakan  komite yang mendukung  Dewan  Komisaris dalam mengkaji dan memberikan  rekomendasi terkait dengan  fungsi pengawasan terhadap implementasi kebijakan remunerasi dan nominasi bagi Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris.

## Dasar Hukum

Pembentukan Komite Remunerasi dan Nominasi didasarkan pada ketentuan sebagai berikut:

- 1. POJK No. 34/POJK.04/2014 tentang Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi Emiten atau Perusahaan Publik; serta
- 2. POJK  No.  45/POJK.03/2015  tentang  Penerapan  Tata Kelola dalam Pemberian Remunerasi bagi Bank Umum.

## Pedoman Kerja Komite Remunerasi dan Nominasi

Bank  memiliki  Surat  Keputusan  Direksi  No.  SKEP .002/DIR/ XI/2022 tentang Perubahan  Susunan  Anggota  Komite Remunerasi  dan  Nominasi  untuk  mengatur  uraian  tugas dan  tanggung  jawab,  keanggotaan,  prosedur  kerja,  dan rapat mengenai pelaksanaan kegiatan Komite Remunerasi dan Nominasi.

the  Bank  activities  by  holding  regular  meetings  with the Bank's Secretary and the Bank's Legal Division;

- 3. Evaluated  the  effectiveness  of  internal  control  and implementation  of  audit  activities  and  audit  results conducted by Internal Audit in 2023;
- 4. Reviewed and discussed reports on audit results with  Public  Accounting  Firm  (KAP)  and  monitored management  in  following  up  on  audit  results  and ensured that the external auditor conveyed all matters related to the auditing standards of public accountants to management; and

If,  in  carrying  out  its  duties,  the  Audit Committee  discovers  matters  expected  to  disrupt  the Bank's activities, the Audit Committee will notify the Board of  Commissioners  no  later  than  14  (fourteen)  working days.

## Remuneration and Nomination Committee

The Remuneration and Nomination Committee is a committee that  assists  the  Board  of  Commissioners  in  reviewing  and providing  recommendations on supervisory function of the implementation of remuneration and nomination policies for the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners.

## Legal Basis

The establishment of Remuneration and Nomination Committee is based on the following provisions:

- 1. POJK No. 34/POJK.04/2014 on Nomination and Remuneration Committee of Issuers or Public Companies; and
- 2. POJK  No.  45/POJK.03/2015  on  Implementation  of Governance in Providing Remuneration for Commercial Banks.

## Remuneration and Nomination Committee Charter

The Bank has the Board of Directors' Decision Letter No. SKEP.002/DIR/XI/2022 on Changes in the Composition of Remuneration  and  Nomination  Committee  to  stipulate the duties and responsibilities, membership, work procedures,  and  meetings  regarding  the  implementation of Remuneration and Nomination Committee's activities.

## Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab Komite Remunerasi dan Nominasi

Uraian tugas dan tanggung jawab Komite Remunerasi dan Nominasi diuraikan sebagai berikut:

- 1. Terkait kebijakan remunerasi:
- a. Melakukan evaluasi terhadap kebijakan remunerasi yang  didasarkan  atas  kinerja,  risiko,  kewajaran dengan peer  group ,  sasaran,  dan  strategi  jangka Panjang Bank, pemenuhan cadangan sebagaimana diatur dalam peraturan perundang-undangan dan potensi  pendapatan  Bank  pada  masa  yang  akan datang;
- b. Menyampaikan  hasil  evaluasi  dan  rekomendasi kepada Dewan Komisaris mengenai:
- · Kebijakan remunerasi bagi Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris  untuk  disampaikan  kepada  RUPS; serta
- · Kebijakan remunerasi bagi pegawai secara keseluruhan untuk disampaikan kepada Direksi;
- c. Memastikan  bahwa  kebijakan  remunerasi  telah sesuai dengan ketentuan; serta
- d. Melakukan evaluasi secara berkala terhadap penerapan kebijakan remunerasi.
- 2. Terkait kebijakan nominasi:
- a. Menyusun dan memberikan rekomendasi mengenai  sistem  serta  prosedur  pemilihan  dan/ atau  penggantian  anggota  Direksi  dan  anggota Dewan Komisaris untuk disampaikan kepada RUPS;
- b. Memberikan rekomendasi mengenai calon anggota Direksi atau usulan calon anggota Dewan Komisaris kepada Dewan Komisaris untuk disampaikan kepada RUPS; serta
- c. Memberikan rekomendasi mengenai pihak independen  yang  akan  menjadi  anggota  Komite Audit serta anggota Komite Pemantau Risiko kepada Dewan Komisaris.

<!-- image -->

<!-- image -->

## Duties and Responsibilities of the Remuneration and Nomination Committee

Description of duties and responsibilities of the Remuneration and Nomination Committee is outlined as follows:

- 1. Regarding remuneration policy:
- a. Evaluate  remuneration  policy  based  on  performance, risk, fairness with peer groups, tar-gets, and longterm strategy of the Bank, fulfillment of reserves as stipulated in laws and regulations, and the Bank's potential future income;
- b. Submit evaluation results and recommendations to the Board of Commissioners on:
- · Remuneration policy for the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners to be sub-mitted to the GMS; and
- · Remuneration policy for employees in overall to be submitted to the Board of Directors;
- c. Ensure that the remuneration policy is in accordance with the provisions; and
- d. Regularly evaluate the implementation of remuneration policy.
- 2. Regarding nomination policy:
- a. Prepare and provide recommendations on system and procedures for selecting and/or re-placing members of  Board  of  Directors  and  members  of  Board  of Commissioners to be sub-mitted to the GMS;
- b. Provide  recommendations  on  candidates  for  the Board  of  Directors  or  proposals  on  candi-dates for  the  Board  of  Commissioners  to  the  Board  of Commissioners to be submitted to the GMS; and
- c. Provide recommendations on independent parties who  will  serve  as  members  of  Audit  Committee and members of Risk Monitoring Committee to the Board of Commissioners.

## Laporan Pelaksanaan Tugas Komite Remunerasi dan Nominasi

Pada tahun 2023, sesuai dengan tugas dan fungsi Komite Remunerasi dan Nominasi sebagaimana tercantum pada Piagam Komite Remunerasi dan Nominasi, Komite  Remunerasi  dan  Nominasi  telah  menyampaikan rekomendasi/usulan calon yang memenuhi syarat sebagai anggota  Direksi  Bank  kepada  Dewan  Komisaris  untuk disampaikan dalam RUPS.

Usulan calon yang disampaikan Komite Remunerasi dan  Nominasi  tersebut dilakukan berdasarkan proses yang  meliputi  kebijakan,  kriteria,  dan  kualifikasi  yang dibutuhkan dalam rangka proses nominasi calon anggota Direksi yang sesuai dengan rencana strategis Bank. Selain sistem  nominasi,  Komite  Remunerasi  dan  Nominasi  juga telah  membantu  Dewan  Komisaris  dalam  mengusulkan remunerasi berupa kenaikan gaji dan bonus untuk tahun 2023.

## Komite Pemantau Risiko

Komite Pemantau Risiko merupakan komite yang mendukung Dewan Komisaris dalam memberikan keyakinan bahwa penerapan manajemen risiko Bank telah memenuhi ketentuan sehingga kegiatan usaha Bank dapat berjalan  sesuai  dengan  peraturan  perundang-undangan yang berlaku.

## Report on the Implementation of Remuneration and Nomination Committee's Duties

In  2023,  in  accordance  with  the  duties  and  functions stated  in  the  Remuneration  and  Nomination  Committee Charter,  the  Remuneration  and  Nomination  Committee submitted recommendations/proposals for candidates who fulfill the requirements as members of the Bank's Board of Directors to the Board of Commissioners to be submitted at the GMS.

Proposals for candidates submitted by the Remuneration and  Nomination  Committee  are  carried  out  based  on  a process which includes policies, criteria, and qualifications required  in  the  process  of  nominating  candidates  of the  Board  of  Directors  in  accordance  with  the  Bank's strategic plan. In addition to the nomination system, the Remuneration  and  Nomination  Committee  also  assisted the Board of Commissioners in proposing remuneration in the form of salary increase and bonus for 2023.

## Risk Monitoring Committee

The Risk Monitoring Committee is a committee that assists the  Board  of  Commissioners  in  providing  assurance  that the Bank's risk management implementation has met the provisions,  so  that  the  Bank's  business  activities  run  in accordance with the applicable laws and regulations.

## Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab Komite Pemantau Risiko

Komite Pemantau Risiko Bank bertugas untuk memberikan pendapat profesional terhadap laporan atau hal-hal yang disampaikan Direksi kepada Dewan Komisaris serta mengidentifikasi hal-hal yang memerlukan perhatian Dewan Komisaris sebagaimana diuraikan berikut:

- 1. Mengadakan  rapat  sesuai  jadwal  atau  dapat  di  luar jadwal yang tetapkan bila perlu;
- 2. Melakukan pemantauan dan evaluasi atas perencanaan dan  pelaksanaan  kebijakan  manajemen  risiko  serta pemantauan atas tindak lanjut setiap penilaian prosedur dan kebijakan manajemen risiko dalam rangka menilai kecukupan pengendalian risiko perbankan dalam  kaitannya  dengan  pengendalian  internal  dan keterkaitannya dengan fungsi perbankan lainnya;
- 3. Memberikan  rekomendasi  kepada  Dewan  Komisaris dengan melakukan:
- a. Evaluasi tentang kesesuaian antara kebijakan manajemen  risiko  dengan  pelaksanaan  kebijakan tersebut;
- b. Kesesuaian antara setiap perencanaan dan pengendalian organisasi terhadap kebijakan manajemen risiko; serta
- c. Pemantauan dan evaluasi pelaksanaan tugas Satuan Kerja Manajemen Risiko;

## Duties and Responsibilities of the Risk Monitoring Committee

The  Bank's  Risk  Monitoring  Committee  is  in  charge  of providing  professional  opinions  on  reports  or  matters submitted  by  the  Board  of  Directors  to  the  Board  of Commissioners  and  identifying  matters  that  require  the attention  of  the  Board  of  Commissioners  as  described below:

- 1. Hold meetings according to schedule or ad-hoc (nonscheduled) if necessary;
- 2. Monitor and evaluate the planning and implementation of risk management policy and monitor the follow-up on each assess-ment of risk management procedures and policy in order to assess the adequacy of  banking  risk  control  in  relation  to  internal  control and its relationship with other bank-ing functions;
- 3. Provide recommendations to the Board of Commissioners by:
- a. Evaluating the conformity between risk management policy and the im-plementation;
- b. Conformity between each organiza-tion's planning and control and the risk management policy; and
- c. Monitoring and evaluating the imple-mentation of Risk Management Unit's duties;

<!-- image -->

PT Bank IBK Indonesia Tbk 2023 Annual Report and Sustainability Report 179

<!-- image -->

- 4. Membuat dan menyampaikan laporan kepada Dewan Komisaris:
- a. Laporan  atas  setiap  penugasan  yang  diberikan; serta
- b. Laporan berkala pelaksanaan kegiatan Komite Pemantau Risiko.

## Wewenang Komite Pemantau Risiko

Komite  Pemantau  Risiko  memiliki  wewenang  sebagai berikut:

- 1. Mengakses  dokumen,  data,  dan  informasi  tentang karyawan,  dana,  aset,  dan  sumber  daya  perusahaan yang diperlukan;
- 2. Berkomunikasi langsung dengan karyawan, termasuk Direksi dan pihak yang menjalankan fungsi manajemen risiko terkait tugas dan tanggung  jawab  Komite Pemantau Risiko;
- 3. Melibatkan pihak independen di luar anggota Komite Pemantau  Risiko  yang  diperlukan  untuk  membantu pelaksanaan tugasnya (jika diperlukan); serta
- 4. Melakukan  kewenangan  lain  yang  diberikan  oleh Dewan Komisaris.

## Rapat Komite Pemantau Risiko

Rapat Komite Pemantau Risiko diadakan minimal 6 (enam) kali  dalam  setahun dan dihadiri oleh paling sedikit 51% dari jumlah anggota Komite Pemantau Risiko. Sepanjang tahun 2023, Komite Pemantau Risiko telah melaksanakan rapat  sebanyak  6  (enam)  kali  dengan  tingkat  kehadiran sebagai berikut:

- 4. Create and submit reports to the Board of Commissioners:
- a. Report on each assigned duty; and
- b. Periodic  reports  on  the  implementa-tion  of  Risk Monitoring Committee's activities.

## Authority of the Risk Monitoring Committee

The Risk Monitoring Committee has the following authorities:

- 1. Access the Company's document, data, and information about  the  Company's  employees,  funds,  assets,  and resources required;
- 2. Communicate directly with employees, including the  Board  of  Directors  and  parties  carrying  out  risk management  functions regarding Risk Monitoring Committee's duties and responsibilities;
- 3. Involve  independent  parties  outside  Risk  Monitoring Committee's  members  who  are  required  to  assist  in performing their duties (if necessary); and
- 4. Perform  other  authorities  assigned  by  the  Board  of Commissioners.

## Komite Asset-Liability (ALCO)

Komite Asset-Liability (ALCO)  merupakan  komite  yang mendukung Direksi untuk melakukan analisis, penyusunan strategi, dan perumusan kebijakan dalam pengelolaan aset dan liabilitas secara terpadu. ALCO juga membantu dalam penentuan lending dan funding  rate serta  pengelolaan likuiditas Bank.

## Asset-Liability Committee (ALCO)

Asset-Liability Committee (ALCO) is a committee that assists the Board of Directors in carrying out analysis, formulating strategies,  and  formulating  policies  in  managing  assets and liabilities in an integrated manner. ALCO also assists in determining lending and funding rates as well as managing the Bank's liquidity.
